      • evaluate

        public Object evaluate(AnnotatedTool tool,
              String expr)
                throws ToolException
        Convenience method for evaluating the provided expression using elements of the annotated tool in the root/context.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool bean
        expr - the OGNL expression to evaluate
        Returns:
        the result of the evaluation
        Throws:
        ToolException - if something goes wrong

      • evaluate

        public Object evaluate(Object tool,
              AnnotatedToolContext context,
              String expr)
                throws ToolException
        Convenience method for performing expression evaluation on the tool with the context in the context map.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool bean
        context - the tool context
        expr - the OGNL expression to evaluate
        Returns:
        the result of the evaluation
        Throws:
        ToolException - if something goes wrong

      • evaluate

        public Object evaluate(Object rootObj,
              Map<String,Object> context,
              String expr)
                throws ToolException
        Parameters:
        rootObj - root object for the OGNL context
        context - set of properties fed into evaluation
        expr - the expression to evaluate. Expects an OGNL expression.
        Returns:
        the result of the expression's evaluation
        Throws:
        ToolException - if something goes wrong
